document_data.name: Westmarket
document_data.mainbody: The '''Westmarket''' was a large, egg-shaped, open marketplace in western [[Daerlun]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]]. It was located on the [[Street of the Dragon]] not far from the Sunset Gate out of the city. [[Saurovin Street]] also intersected the Westmarket at its southern point and headed southeast. The largest building facing the Westmarket was the popular [[Mighty Mace]] inn and tavern on the southeast side.{{Cite dragon/287/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: Shadowdark House|70}}
